name: video-resolution-changer
title: Video Resolution Changer
description: Change video resolution to standard formats (480p/720p/1080p/4K)
content:
Overview

This application changes video resolution to standard formats including 480p, 720p, 1080p, and 4K. Built using MoviePy, it maintains aspect ratio and provides high-quality output.

Features

  • Support for standard resolutions: 480p, 720p, 1080p, 4K
  • Maintains 16:9 aspect ratio
  • High-quality H.264 encoding with AAC audio
  • Preserves frame rate and duration

Parameters

  • Input Video: Upload your video file from stash
  • Target Resolution: Choose 480p (854x480), 720p (1280x720), 1080p (1920x1080), or 4K (3840x2160)
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a resized MP4 video file with the resolution suffix added to the original filename (e.g., video_720p.mp4).

Use Cases

  • Standardizing video resolution across a project
  • Downscaling 4K videos for smaller file sizes
  • Upscaling lower resolution videos
  • Preparing videos for specific platform requirements
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$PPID"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/video_resolution_changer.py" "${videoFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -r "${resolution}"
